extDescription.message: Yi koyi da fadada firefox a cikin Chrome, Opera da sauran masu bincike na Chromium

homeTitle.message: Sanya Addini Firefox A cikin Google Chrome

homeSubtitle.message: Yi koyi da fadada firefox a cikin Chrome, Opera da sauran masu bincike na Chromium.

homeCtaHelpText.message: Tsarin tallafi: crx, zip ko xpi

homeInvalidUploadError.message: Zaɓaɓɓun fayil ɗin ba shi da tallafi

installerStepDownloadBodyText.message: Foxified yana zazzagewa yana shirya tsawaitawa don girkawa. Da fatan za a ɗan ɗan jira don saukarwar ta kammala.

installerStepInstallationWarning.message: Foxified baya tallafawa duk APIs da ake buƙata don wannan addon. Wannan zai karya wasu ayyukan addon.

installerStepCompleteBodyText.message: Foxified ya gama girka fadada. Da fatan za a jira sabon tsawo don farawa.

installerDownloadErrorMessage.message: Ba a yi nasarar zazzage tsawo ba

installerExtractErrorMessage.message: Ba a yi nasarar cire fayiloli ba

installerAppIdErrorMessage.message: Ba a yi nasarar cire ID na app ba.
